posts.content:
Hello,
would exchange my 72 Westy for a split.
The Westy is in good condition, has an adjustable front axle and a nice interior.
We are looking for a German T1 LHD in good condition. Valuation report of 30,000 euros made last year. Unfortunately, alternator problems at the moment. Little things are always to be done - it has been standing for 4 months. I lost my temper.
So if you want to exchange a good split, feel free to report! Old V5 copy available, cause it was Usa Import to Uk and than to Germany.
Pictures per PN or per Mail. I canÂ´t upload here
Greetings, Jens
